scripts.local: npm run build && nodemon --config nodemon.json --inspect -r 'dotenv/config' src/app.ts
scripts.minifyjs: for script in dist/assets/javascripts/*.js; do uglifyjs $script -cmo $script $(${CI:-false} || echo --source-map includeSources,url=${script##*/}.map); done
scripts.buildsass: sass --load-path=$(npm ls -p govuk-frontend)/.. --style compressed assets/css/app.scss dist/assets/app.css $(${CI:-false} && echo --no-source-map || echo --embed-sources)
scripts.buildgovuk: govuk=$(npm ls -p govuk-frontend)/dist/govuk; cp -r $govuk/assets/* dist/assets/ && cp $govuk/all.bundle.js dist/assets/javascripts/govuk-all.js
scripts.build: npm run buildts && npm run buildsass && npm run buildjs && npm run buildgovuk && npm run minifyjs
